comment.author: 37206071@N03
comment._content: With assistance from New Ulm Public Library patrons and Library Director Larry Hlavsa, I'm able to identify the musician pictured here. His name is Curtis Myloe Iverson (b. Sept. 29, 1934, Roseau, Minn.-d. Jan. 15, 2005, New Ulm). In 1968, Iverson became Senior High band director. When his health led him to retire in 1987, he continued teaching private lessons in his home for 15 years. His complete obituary can be found at: www.oweb.com/newulm/obits/obits011705.html
